Name: Null Drifter
About the game: Null Drifter is a 1BIT LO-FI shooter, a journey into the void inside a computer simulation! Lose yourself in this frenetic yet chill experience! A Minimalistic twin-stick shooter! A Simulation for space-fighter pilots! Made to train them to defeat the awakened forces of the void! Secretly part of the “Project Starship” World, used by the poor 4 souls of “Project Starship X”, before embarking for their mission: defeating the army of Cthulhu!
